suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
table <- readRDS("~/Google Drive/Futbol/basket_table.rds") 
kable(table, digits = 1, align = 'lccccc', row.names = FALSE, col.names = c('Club','Qualitat', 'Class.', 'G-P', 'Campió',"Playoff")) %>% add_header_above(c('Projecció' = 2, 'Mitjana' = 2, 'Probabilitat (%)' = 2)) %>% column_spec(1, bold = T) %>% column_spec(2, border_right = T) %>% column_spec(4, border_right = T)
